```{r intro, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(officer)
library(flextable)
invisible(source(file = "PrepDefinitions.R"))
```

The illnesses/outcomes used in HjerteTal are based on the ICD-10 codes as follows:

```{r, echo = FALSE}

out_pretty <- flextable(diag_pretty, col_keys = c("diag_en", "code_simple")) %>%
  width(j = c("diag_en"), width = 2.1) %>%
  width(j = "code_simple", width = 2.3) %>%
  align(j = c("diag_en", "code_simple")) %>%
  align(part = "header") %>%
  fontsize(size = 12) %>%
  fontsize(size = 13, part = "header") %>%
  set_header_labels(diag_en = "Sygdomme",
                    code_simple = "ICD-10 code(s)")

out_pretty

```
